name: Remove Appmenu Icons
description:
As the name implies, just get rid of all the icons from the (usually orange) Firefox button menu.
Español: Como implica el nombre, esconde todos los iconos del boton de menu de Firefox.
additional_info:
I Personally use it along with the Personal Menu Addon. https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/personal-menu/?src=search
Took the code from this forum: http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?f=7&t=2057009&start=135
Español: Tome el codigo de este foro: http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?f=7&t=2057009&start=135
